title: Configure PWA with Cryonex branding and uploaded logo

requirements.summary: Update PWA manifest to use 'Cryonex' as the app name and short_name
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json name field is set to 'Cryonex'
manifest.json short_name field is set to 'Cryonex'

file_operations.description: Update the 'name' field to 'Cryonex' and 'short_name' field to 'Cryonex' in the PWA manifest. Keep all other existing fields (display, theme_color, background_color, categories, icons array structure) unchanged.

requirements.summary: Generate PWA icon images from the uploaded Cryonex logo in standard PWA sizes: 192x192px and 512x512px
acceptanceCriteria: 192x192 icon generated and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
512x512 icon generated and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
Icons maintain the Cryonex logo design with transparent or appropriate background

file_operations.description: Image generation handled by image system. This operation documents that the 192x192 icon will be available at frontend/public/assets/generated/cryonex-icon-192.dim_192x192.png showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt on transparent background.

Image generation handled by image system. This operation documents that the 512x512 icon will be available at frontend/public/assets/generated/cryonex-icon-512.dim_512x512.png showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt on transparent background.

requirements.summary: Update PWA manifest icons array to reference the newly generated Cryonex logo icons at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json icons array includes both generated icon paths
Icon src paths point to frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
Both icons specify correct sizes and type (image/png)
Both icons specify purpose as 'any maskable'

file_operations.description: Update the 'icons' array to reference the generated Cryonex logo icons. Set the 192x192 icon src to '/assets/generated/cryonex-icon-192.dim_192x192.png' with sizes '192x192', type 'image/png', and purpose 'any maskable'. Set the 512x512 icon src to '/assets/generated/cryonex-icon-512.dim_512x512.png' with sizes '512x512', type 'image/png', and purpose 'any maskable'. Replace any existing icon entries in the array.

requirements.summary: Update the PWA manifest theme_color and background_color to match the app's existing cyan/neon cyberpunk theme using the colors from index.css
acceptanceCriteria: theme_color uses the cyan accent color from the existing theme
background_color uses the dark background color from the existing theme
Colors are consistent with the app's cyberpunk aesthetic

file_operations.description: Update 'theme_color' to use the cyan accent color from the app's cyberpunk theme (extract from frontend/src/index.css CSS variables, likely the primary cyan color used for glows and accents). Update 'background_color' to use the dark background color from the theme (extract from frontend/src/index.css, likely the dark metallic background). Use hex color format for browser compatibility.

requirements.summary: Update index.html to reference the Cryonex app name in the title tag
acceptanceCriteria: HTML title tag displays 'Cryonex' or 'Cryonex - [appropriate subtitle]'
Title is visible in browser tab

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag to display 'Cryonex - Gamified Task Manager' or similar appropriate subtitle that reflects the app's purpose. Keep all existing meta tags, manifest link, and other head elements unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add Apple touch icon link in index.html pointing to the 512x512 generated Cryonex logo for iOS PWA support
acceptanceCriteria: Apple touch icon link tag added to index.html head
Link references the 512x512 generated icon path

file_operations.description: Add <link rel='apple-touch-icon' href='/assets/generated/cryonex-icon-512.dim_512x512.png'> to the <head> section. Place it after the existing manifest link and before the theme-color meta tag. This enables iOS PWA support with the Cryonex logo.
